meanings.definition: A device for measuring time, such as a clock or watch.
meanings.sent1: The antique horologe chimed loudly in the hallway.
meanings.sent2: I glanced at the horologe on the wall to check the time.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked the horologe off the table, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat like a frantic horologe, counting the seconds until the news arrived.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the horologe fascinated the curious child.

meanings.definition: The art or science of making timepieces.
meanings.sent1: His passion for horologe led him to become a skilled watchmaker.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of exquisite horologe crafted by master artisans.
meanings.sent3: In the world of horologe, precision is key to creating functional timepieces.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to stand still as he delved into the intricate world of horologe.
meanings.sent5: The horologe workshop buzzed with creativity and innovation.
